tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE classic_car_restoration_expenses (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  expense_date DATE,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Expense (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description VARCHAR(255),
    cost DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationProjects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  car_make VARCHAR(50),
  car_model VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  estimated_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  expense_date DATE,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE CarOwners (owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY, owner_name STRING, car_model STRING, purchase_date DATE, purchase_price DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE Expenses (expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY, expense_date DATE, expense_type STRING, expense_amount DECIMAL, owner_id INT REFERENCES CarOwners(owner_id))
CREATE TABLE PartsInventory (part_id INT PRIMARY KEY, part_name STRING, part_type STRING, part_price DECIMAL, quantity INT)
CREATE TABLE Revenue (revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY, revenue_date DATE, revenue_source STRING, revenue_amount DECIMAL, owner_id INT REFERENCES CarOwners(owner_id))

CREATE TABLE project (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    expense_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    expense_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(id)
);

CREATE TABLE labor (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    worker_name VARCHAR(50),
    hours_worked INT,
    rate DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    progress_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(id)
);
